Text: Clean Fuels th Qtr Fcst Net Income Cc Attached is our Clean Fuels th Quarter Net Income Forecast Please note the following Note that we do not have September actuals for the MTBE Plant or Storage Facility Topside entries are made each month to record the EOTT Activity I have yet to acquire the Hyperion reports Our Total Year Plant IBIT has improved from the previous forecast primarily due to revised Methanol Plant IBIT Exposures Other Items Severance costs in are estimated to be MM Take or Pay Oxygen cost in is estimated to be MM Lease expense for the four year period from will be MM Ongoing caretaking cost of the plant if left as is is estimated to be MM per year We have received a M bid to demo the Methanol Plant If you have any questions please call Tom Meers or myself
